title: Check Even or Odd
algorithmDescription: Determine if an integer is even or odd using the modulo operator
detailedDescription: Write a program that reads an integer and determines whether it is even or odd. Output 'Even' for even numbers and 'Odd' for odd numbers.
hints: Use the modulo operator (%) to get remainder after division by 2
If n % 2 == 0, the number is even
If n % 2 == 1 (or != 0), the number is odd
solutionApproach: Read integer, check n % 2, print 'Even' or 'Odd' accordingly.
testCaseCriteria: Must correctly identify even/odd for all integers, including 0 and negatives
